To benefit from maRATP dedicated services and offers, you have to accept our new
maRATP Terms and Conditions of Use
By clicking « %s » you will lose access to all your customised maRATP services and offers.
An error occurred while deleting your account
Your session has expired, please login again
If you decline the new maRATP Terms and Conditions of Use, we will have to delete your maRATP account.
Before deleting your maRATP account, help us understand why…

I receive too many emails from maRATP.
The exclusive offers don\'t suit me.

An error occurred while creating your account
You already have a maRATP account.
Please enter a valid email address.
Invalid password. It must be contain at least %s characters.
I agree to receive communications from RATP to be informed of network news, ideas for outings, exclusive offers and customised information.

In accordance with the French Data Protection and Freedom of Information Law, once your maRATP account is created, you will be able to access, modify and delete your personal data. You will also be able to modify your emailing preferences and delete your maRATP account.
I accept and I recognize to have acquainted of %s
maRATP Terms and Conditions of Use
All your information will be lost.
Do you really want to quit?
Account update failed, please try again later.
To be up-to-date on traffic status on your lines, enable push notifications. We closely look on your journeys in order to alert you if needed.
Retrouvez toute l’actualité de votre ligne sur Twitter
Sorry, we could\'t find any result.
Please turn on location services to enhance your mobility experience
Please allow RATP app to access your location to enhance your experience
Sorry, we could\'t find any result.
To keep a eye on your favorite station, add it via the app
An error has occurred during the loading of next stops Please retry later.
Keep an eye on your stations. Leave in time!
Pressez et faites glisser vos arrêts favoris pour les ordonner!
I agree to send RATP my phone\'s technical settings.
Your feedback is important to help us improve this application. Please be as precise as possible so that we can take account of your message most effectively.
The application restarted automatically. The error has been sent to our technical teams so that it can be analysed as soon as possible.
For customised services and options, please sign in to maRATP.
Hello %s !\nThis is your personal area where you can change your preferences and options
Please relaunch your application now to take these changes into account
Search for a journey to your %s favourite
Find your way easily by adding %s as a bookmark
Search for a journey to work
There is disruption on your line
There is currently disruption on several lines.
Several of your lines are suspended.
Travel with peace of mind,\nall your trip are OK!
The metro and RER are currently closed…
Works are planned on your lines.
Works are underway on your lines.
Next departures from your favourite stations! Set off on time!
You will be warned in case of trouble on your favorite lines
Find here the real time traffic info provided by the official Twitter feed
Sorry, lines maps are unavailable for the moment.

In order to finish with the installation process, the app needs to restart.
By clicking on the following button, the app will stop and you will have to restart it on your own.
We need your agreement to send you alerts. You may disable it in your settings.
A problem on your line? Get alerts!
The version of your phone does not allow access to the service.
An NFC chip is required to use the service
Sign in to buy your travel passes and for after-sales service
Don’t have a NavigoConnect account yet?
Activate your account using the activation email sent to this address
Your login or password is incorrect.
Some required information for buying this ticket is missing. Please provide it to complete the purchase.
To make life easier, your smartphone becomes your ticket.
This service is subject to conditions. Check your eligibility in the Frequently Asked Questions. This trial has been put in place by Île-de-France Mobilités, in partnership with RATP and SNCF.
Download the Navigo LAB app to purchase and validate, via your Smartphone, ticket t+ booklets and weekly or monthly Navigo travel passes, valid on RATP and SNCF networks.
Next schedules are theoretical and for reference only :
More schedules will be available soon
For ease of navigation, we recommend activating geolocation.

This is the internal test version of the future RATP application.

It has been built and will be changed thanks to your feedback, so we rely on you to tell us what you like, what you miss in your daily use and what could be improved.

You can give your feedback via the Urban Web form or via email.

We hope you enjoy discovering the application!
The RATP app has changed. Use maRATP for customised services and special offers.
To use this feature, please allow location access in your device settings
To access this service, you must give us permission to read phone\'s status via the settings.

This tracer allows us to establish statistics and frequentation measures to our app (visitor numbers and use of the various elements making up the app). It helps us to improve our itinerary search algorithm using your search history and doing test on the user interface. It uses a pseudonymous identifier which does not identify you.
This tracer allows us to monitor the number of crash of our app. It alerts us in case of potential malfunctions. It uses a pseudonymous identifier which does not identify you.
This tracer allows us to measure, diagnose and improve the performance of our app. It alerts us in case of possible malfunctions. It uses a pseudonymous identifier which does not identify you.
We care about your privacy. That\'s why your consents in terms of tracker is under your control. Please find below the complete list of trackers used in the application and their description.
Please choose a time in the future.
C O 2 emissions of my route: %1$s, against %2$s by car. %3$s spent walking.
We couldn\'t proceed with your search.
To enable notifications, access to your phone %s.
We need your agreement to send you alerts
Why should I give my agreement?
Don\'t miss any alert on your lines
Know more about the usage of your personal data
An error has occurred during the modification of your informations.
You’ll no longer be able to take advantage of NavigoConnect (buying or loading a ticket, after-sales service…)
Do you really want to log out of NavigoConnect?
An error has occurred during the modification of your password.
This service is accessible with a maRATP account
Your navigo pass can be recharged directly in this app !
In order to access this heading, the installation of the service via "My travel tickets" is necessary.
This dysfunction will be analysed. The documents of your file will be automatically attached to your request.
To find your bought travel ticket, you have to attach your receipt.
You can make additions to your request.
There’s no ticket on your phone.
I’m finding it difficult to validate with my phone
Have you declared the loss/theft of your phone?
For quicker processing of your request, you can add your receipt.
Your request cannot be considered.\n You must first declare the loss or theft of your phone to your operator.
You can make a request to Île-de-France Mobilités service.
Can’t find your old travel tickets?
Do you want to refer this problem to Île-de-France Mobilités?
This service is not compatible with your new device. The travel tickets on your old phone and/or SIM card can still be used with your old device.
Only Navigo Month and Navigo Week travel passes can be refunded.
Do you want to be refunded?
This service is incompatible with your device.
Analysis of your phone\'s content in progress. Wait a few moments.
The travel ticket on your phone did not load. Try again.
Only Navigo Month and Navigo Week travel passes can be refunded.\n Only one travel ticket can be refunded at a time.
Which travel ticket would you like to be refunded?
Your request could not be dealt with automatically. It will be passed on to Île-de-France Mobilités.
Unfortunately, you don\'t have any refundable travel tickets…
Some travel ticket can be refunded under certain conditions. Find all the information in the Frequently Asked Questions.
Your travel ticket has been cancelled. An email confirming the processing of your request has just been sent to you.
You can request a refund. This request will result in cancellation of the selected ticket.
Your travel ticket does not work when validating?
Have you already bought a travel ticket on your pass?
Done and back to the main screen
Your Navigo pass has been updated
An operation planned on your pass can not be done if you bought a travel ticket which was not charged you will be refunded
You can load your travel ticket by clicking on the button, or on M travel ticket screen.\n If it is not reloaded within few hours, your purchase will be cancelled and refunded.
A travel ticket is awaiting loading on your Navigo pass.
Either the title has been reloaded or a cancellation email has been sent to you
There are no tickets awaiting loading
Go to this section to find out more about topping up the Navigo pass.
If you haven’t received anything, you can check the content of your Navigo pass.
Check that you haven’t received a payment cancellation receipt.
Maybe your travel ticket was cancelled?
You must be connected to the Internet to use this service
Your phone’s NFC must be activated to use this service
Please load your travel ticket awaiting distribution before buying a new ticket
Step %1$d of %2$d, go to next step %3$d
Step %1$d of %2$d, go to previous step %3$d
Some devices allow validation: you don\'t need your Navigo pass anymore! Try out your phone now.
Queue lines are over with the RATP app!
It only takes few seconds from your living room!
T+ tickets and Navigo pass (month, week, day) are available in the app!
On cancelling the transaction, you will be refunded within a few hours.
Do you really want to cancel the transaction?
Your ticket could not be cancelled. Please try again in a few minutes.
Please check the validity of the email address.
A communication problem occurred with the payment system. You can retry.

The status of your payment could not be confirmed. If your ticket hasn’t loaded within few hours, your payment will automatically be cancelled or refunded. If you want to buy a ticket now, go to the My tickets screen.
A loading error occurred, please try again later
Automatic refund within a few hours
To make a new purchase, we must first check that there are no tickets awaiting loading.
Use a light, neutral background, make your face clearly visible and look straight ahead. Ready?
This photo allows you to be identified in case of inspection by a ticket controller.
An error has occurred while saving your photo. Please try again.
To use this service, your phone’s NFC must be activated
ticket top up on Navigo card
ticket not top up on SIM card
ticket top up on SIM card
Your phone is not compatible with the top-up service.
Your can only load Navigo pass from your phone.
An error has occurred. Please check your network connection and refresh the screen
Queue lines are over with the RATP app!
Ticket purchase unavailable. Due to a technical problem, it is not possible to buy a ticket for the moment.
You don’t have a travel ticket
Bring your pass close to the back of your phone. Wait a few moments.
Your pass could not be read correctly. Please try again. If this problem persists, go to %s.
You will receive a receipt by email at this address:
An activation email has been sent to this address: %s
An error has occurred during the creation of your account.
The displayed data could not be updated.
An error occurred while saving. Try Again.
Your maRATP information can be used for your NavigoConnect account
Some ticket types such as travel passes are personal. This information is needed in case of inspection by a ticket controller.

By law, once registered, you will be able to access, modify or delete your data and change your subscription preferences from your personal area in NavigoConnect. If needed, you can also cancel your registration.

Buying the travel pass you have selected requires that you provide your photo and your date of birth. This information is needed in case of inspection by a ticket controller. Travel passes are personal.
Still can’t see your activation email? It might be in your spam…
The email could not be sent to your email address.
Service unavailable. Due to a technical problem, the service is temporarily unavailable.
Sign in to maRATP, to take advantage of a personalised experience through exclusive services and special offers.
This installation requires a good mobile network and internet connection…
Are you sure you want to quit the installation?
The contactless ticket extension is not correctly installed. Installation of the service cannot continue.
There was a problem checking the compatibility of your phone, please try again later.
Here’s where to buy your tickets!
Permission for the Ticket Sans Contact application
Load your Navigo pass from you app!
Use your device instead of your Navigo pass!
Your device is not compatible with the service.
You cannot buy tickets to top-up a Navigo pass from this phone.
Buy travel tickets and load them to your Navigo pass.
Your phone is not compatible with the paperless service.
Buy and validate your travel tickets from this phone.
A problem occurred during installation, please consult the FAQs.
Your phone is not compatible with the paperless service.
A problem occurred during installation, please consult the FAQs.
Your phone is not compatible, you cannot access this service.
Your phone’s NFC technology is not compatible with access to this service.
Your phone’s NFC technology is not compatible with access to this service.
Your phone does not have a SIM card to use this service. Please insert a compatible SIM card
Your SIM card is not compatible with the ticketing service. You should contact your operator or consult the FAQs.
Your SIM card is compatible with the ticketing service, but action by your operator is required. Please contact your operator.
A problem occurred with the Ticket Sans Contact application. Please restart your phone.
Please check permissions for the Ticket Sans Contact application in your settings.
To access this service, we need \'Make and manage calls\' phone permission.
Without your permission, it’s impossible to find out if your phone is compatible with the service…
Your call data will never be used and remains strictly confidential.
Depending on your device, the setup may take a few seconds. Please keep the RATP app open.
Within a few taps, you will be able to load your Navigo pass from your phone.\n\nBefore that, you need to set up %1$s app.
Thanks for installing %1$s app. Please wait a few seconds…
You have already bought all the authorized ticket. Quit the screen to see your tickets.
An error occurred while loading the ticket catalogue. Try refreshing the page in a few moments.
Return to this page for details of this travel ticket.
Launch the installation to know the compatibility of your new device.
Cancel and back to the form
Do you really want to quit the form ?
The data that you have entered will be lost.
Prepare the required documents and make sure you have the file number received by email (following your first contact).\n\nGo to the Navigo website to complete your file.
In order to finalize your request, please fill up your request number received by mail and attach the requested files.
I want to complete my request
Maximum %1$d documents, each with a maximum size of %2$dMo in %3$s.
The request could not be sent. Please try again.
You can send up to %1$d supporting documents in the following formats: %2$s.
You can send up to %1$d supporting documents, each with a maximum size of %2$dMB.
Your request will be dealt with promptly. An email will be sent to you at this address: %s
Usually it suffices to re-install the service from your “My tickets” screen, or by tapping the button below.
If you still have problems, you can use the form to send a help request.
I can’t top up my Navigo pass
Be sure to report your loss / theft as soon as possible.\n\nGo to the Navigo website to take the necessary steps to get a refund.
I’ve lost my phone or it has been stolen
Be sure to explain your request simply and precisely. Attach any documents you consider necessary, to help deal with your request.
Fill in the purchase date of the ticket for which you want a receipt.
Only one travel ticket can be selected per request.
Choose a travel ticket for which you want a receipt.
This service is incompatible with your device.
This service is incompatible with your device. You should contact your operator or consult the FAQs.
Your new device is compatible with this service !
You can buy and validate travel tickets with your phone.
Installation failed. You can make a request to Île-de-France Mobilités service.
The documents of your file will be automatically attached to your request.\n\n You can complete your request.
I haven’t used my travel pass
I’m finding it difficult to validate with my phone
The ticket did not load. You have been automatically refunded.
The ticket did not load. You can try again now or later.

An error has occurred.
You can try to load it again from the ‘My tickets’ screen.

 If it is not reloaded within a few hours, it will be cancelled automatically and you will be refunded.
